txt.en: Helgi Goblinbane's statue would not be complete without an arm to grip a great axe.

Helgi Goblinbane's statue would not be complete without an arm to grip a great axe.\n\nThe goblins of Durin's Way destroyed the statue, and its parts can be found scattered throughout Moria. A dwarf named Uxi endeavours to reassemble this statue.
The statue's arm is at Sulnul-dûm, east of Tharâkh Bazân.\n\nYou should collect the arm of Helgi Goblinbane's statue.

'Thank you for your assistance, [placeholder]. It would have been a pity if this piece had remained in the hands of the Enemy.\n\n'I will send this over to Uxi right away, for his devotion to the statue of Helgi Goblinbane is legendary already.'
Arnod is at Tharâkh Bazân, west of Sulnul-dûm.\n\nArnod will be delighted to hear you found the statue-piece.
'I believe the arm of the Goblinbane's statue lies somewhere in Sulnul-dûm.'
Talk to Arnod at Tharâkh Bazân
Talk to Oxi at Thurkh Mudmulnalâ
